title: A pleasaunt dialogue, concerning phisicke and phisitions
author: Mexía, Pedro, 1496?-1552?
notes: With an additional title page: A delectable dialogue: .. Translated out of the Castlin tongue. By T.N.
A translation of Mexía's "Dialogo de los medicos" from his "Dialogos o coloquios".
Running title reads: A dialogue concerning phisick and phisitions.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
